我尋晚睇左, 又唔覺得中伏, 因為trailer都預視左呢套係愛情片, 否則女主角唔會講you die i die呢D, 我個人又睇得幾enjoy
不過睇開動作片既人反應應好大, 因為成套都偏靜偏悶, 畢竟大部份時間都係二人一機器人係度
感受最深可能係男主角猶豫在叫唔叫醒女主角, 明明係錯但都會做, 但自己係當時環境, 都可能會做同一樣野, 畢竟無可能一個人幾十年長流流一個

睇Trailer以為兩人早醒背後有陰謀
原來冇
兩人都唔係一齊醒
但有個謊言

我覺得套戲有兩個message:

愛情想關係要靠講大話
講真話先傷感情

唔好理終點或目的
最重要活在當下好好享受

我覺得如果男主角真係死反而會更震撼

我比7.5/10
值得睇既係

Sony買左劇本之後成個方向就變哂

The original script for Passengers was written by Jon Spaihts in 2007, and had been in development hell for years.[12] At one point, the film was set to star Keanu Reeves and Emily Blunt,[13] with the production budget being a relatively low $35 million.[14] Brian Kirk was originally scheduled to make his feature directorial debut with the film, with Reeves in the lead.[15][16] On December 5, 2014, it was announced that Sony Pictures Entertainment had won the auction for the rights to the film.[17] In early 2015, Morten Tyldum was chosen to helm the film.[18] Tyldum had always wanted to do a massive sci-fi action movie, but also stressed the importance of a character-driven, rather than a cold and distant, sci-fi film.[10]

The original script for Passengers was written by Jon Spaihts in 2007, and had been in development hell for years.[12] At one point, the film was set to star Keanu Reeves and Emily Blunt,[13] with the production budget being a relatively low $35 million.[14] Brian Kirk was originally scheduled to make his feature directorial debut with the film, with Reeves in the lead.[15][16] On December 5, 2014, it was announced that Sony Pictures Entertainment had won the auction for the rights to the film.[17] In early 2015, Morten Tyldum was chosen to helm the film.[18] Tyldum had always wanted to do a massive sci-fi action movie, but also stressed the importance of a character-driven, rather than a cold and distant, sci-fi film.[10]

啱啱睇完。
由於我冇睇過任何trailer，所以冇sci-fi嘅期望，亦唔知你哋講咩陰謀乜乜乜。以愛情片而言，我覺得幾高汁。
前半段塑造男主角強烈掙扎非常深刻，突顯出人性懦弱。女主角醒咗後嘅愛情進展好有味道
之後嘅矛盾衝突亦處處到肉，Happy ending個心舒服。

題材settings新穎，特技冇得輸～
愛情片而言7.5/10
